attributes.action: All essential workers should get a tax reduction to reward their great service.
attributes.additional_details: To show your appreciation and gratitude for the many hard working, selfless people keeping this country going.
attributes.background: All emergency services workers, carers, shop staff and other essential works who risk their health and work tirelessly should be thanked and rewarded with a 3 month Income tax reduction.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
